title: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When I have a .java file open in the editor and click the new class button, the 'Enclosing Type' field is blank.
EB: I expect the 'Enclosing Type' field to default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field.
